bulletin1.title: Welcome to the Bulletin Board
bulletin1.label: label-info
bulletin1.author: Matthew Wang
bulletin1.content: Hey there, this is the Awesome Suite Bulletin! Here, I'll post release notes, news about the app, and some helpful tips and tricks about the suite. Right now, this is all manual, but eventually I'll work on making this fetch off of a server and being automatic!
